constantValues: This entity identifies an instance or a type of a manufactured item that is used in the provision of healthcare without being substantially changed through that activity.

definitions.description: This entity identifies an instance or a type of a manufactured item that is used in the provision of healthcare without being substantially changed through that activity.

members.name: deviceId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: name

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.description: The name of the custom entity.

members.name: carrierAIDC

constantValues: The full UDI carrier of the Automatic Identification and Data Capture (AIDC) technology representation of the bar code string as printed on the packaging of the device - E.g a bar code or RFID.

members.description: The full UDI carrier of the Automatic Identification and Data Capture (AIDC) technology representation of the bar code string as printed on the packaging of the device - E.g a bar code or RFID.

members.name: deviceNumber

constantValues: Unique instance identifiers assigned to a device by manufacturers other organizations or owners.

members.description: Unique instance identifiers assigned to a device by manufacturers other organizations or owners.

members.description: Status of the Device availability.

members.name: expirationDate

constantValues: The date and time beyond which this device is no longer valid or should not be used (if applicable).

constantValues: Lot number assigned by the manufacturer.

members.name: manufacturer
members.description: A name of the manufacturer.

members.name: manufacturerDate

constantValues: The date and time when the device was manufactured.

members.description: The date and time when the device was manufactured.

members.name: model

constantValues: The "model" is an identifier assigned by the manufacturer to identify the product by its type. This number is shared by the all devices sold as the same type.

members.description: The "model" is an identifier assigned by the manufacturer to identify the product by its type. This number is shared by the all devices sold as the same type.

arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: owner

value.description: An organization that is responsible for the provision and ongoing maintenance of the device.

arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: patient

value.name: type

arguments.name: UDIEntryType_display

constantValues: A coded entry to indicate how the data was entered.

members.description: A coded entry to indicate how the data was entered.

members.name: UDIIssuer

constantValues: Organization that is charged with issuing UDIs for devices

members.description: Organization that is charged with issuing UDIs for devices

members.name: udiJurisdiction

constantValues: The identity of the authoritative source for UDI generation within a jurisdiction. All UDIs are globally unique within a single namespace with the appropriate repository uri as the system.

members.description: The identity of the authoritative source for UDI generation within a jurisdiction. All UDIs are globally unique within a single namespace with the appropriate repository uri as the system.

members.name: URL

constantValues: A network address on which the device may be contacted directly.

members.description: A network address on which the device may be contacted directly.

members.name: version

constantValues: The version of the device, if the device has multiple releases under the same model, or if the device is software or carries firmware.

members.description: The version of the device, if the device has multiple releases under the same model, or if the device is software or carries firmware.
